Who could have watched [Danny2462](https://www.youtube.com/user/Danny2462)'s 1.0 video and not be moved by his heartfelt plea?

![OGVQ09J.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OGVQ09J.jpg)

It's okay Danny. We hear you.

Or at least, me and NathanKell heard you.

Presenting **CursorDeleter**, a really teeny modlet for resetting KSP's cursor back to whatever your default is. Just grab the CursorDeleter directory out of the zip and copy it to your GameData directory. Includes full source in the zip (not that it's particularly complex).

~~Download from [here](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/230348-cursordeleter).~~ (rip Curseforge)

~~^Download from^[^here^](http://greenoctagon.co.uk/CursorDeleter.zip)^for now.^~~

Spacedock link here: [https://spacedock.info/mod/920/CursorDeleter](https://spacedock.info/mod/920/CursorDeleter)

Woohoo! Thanks, I was hoping someone would do this. Not that I don't like that KSP has its own cursor, but I like mine better. And so does Danny.

May the Kraken bless you.

-Danny (Yeah this username is pretty random, I've created the account before I really got into YouTube. Check Twitter for proof that I'm... me.)
